summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of East 41st Street and certain other streets and avenues, by concrete walks, Local Improvement District No. 2841, and of East 42nd Street and other streets and avenues, by grading, Local Improvement District No. 4289, on a portion of Lot 15, Block 2, Scottish Heights Addition.
